Package databasemodel.modelinterfaces

Interface OfferModelInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
OfferModel
public interface OfferModelInterface
Interface to create User objects getting them from a database in SQL.
Version:
1.0.0 2021
Author:
Group8-SEP2

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void createOffer​(Offer offer)
    The method adds the Offer object to the database Offer schema.
    void deleteOffer​(Offer offer)
    The method deletes the Offer object from the database Offer schema.
    OfferList getAllOffers()
    The method returns all the offers available in the Offer schema.
    Offer readById​(int id)
    The method returns an Offer object from the database Offer schema.
    java.util.List<Offer> readByOfferTitle​(java.lang.String searchString)
    The method returns an Offer object with the same title from the database Offer schema.
    java.util.ArrayList<Offer> returnCombinedFilter​(double minPrice, double maxPrice, int noOfRooms, java.lang.String type, int floor, double deposit)
    The method returns a list of offers from the database using a combined search filter and returns the objects that correspond to the arguments inserted.
    java.util.List<Offer> returnDeposit​(double deposit)
    The method returns a list of offers from the database that have the deposit indicated in the searchInt.
    java.util.List<Offer> returnNumberOfRooms​(int noOfRooms)
    The method returns a list of offers from the database that have the same or more number of rooms.
    java.util.List<Offer> returnOfferFloor​(int floor)
    The method returns list of offers from the database that are located on the same floor.
    java.util.List<Offer> returnOfferType​(java.lang.String type)
    The method returns list of offers from the database with the same type.
    java.util.List<Offer> returnPriceRange​(double min, double max)
    The method returns a list of Offer objects with a price per month between those 2 variables.
    void updateOffer​(Offer offer)
    The method updates the Offer object from the database Offer schema.

  • Method Details

    • createOffer

      void createOffer​(Offer offer) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method adds the Offer object to the database Offer schema.
      Parameters:
      offer - The offer to be added.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • readById

      Offer readById​(int id) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method returns an Offer object from the database Offer schema.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique id of the offer.
      Returns:
      The Offer with the indicated id.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • readByOfferTitle

      java.util.List<Offer> readByOfferTitle​(java.lang.String searchString) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method returns an Offer object with the same title from the database Offer schema.
      Parameters:
      searchString - The title of the offer.
      Returns:
      The Offer with a similar title.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • updateOffer

      void updateOffer​(Offer offer) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method updates the Offer object from the database Offer schema.
      Parameters:
      offer - The offer.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • deleteOffer

      void deleteOffer​(Offer offer) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method deletes the Offer object from the database Offer schema.
      Parameters:
      offer - The offer to be deleted.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • getAllOffers

      OfferList getAllOffers() throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method returns all the offers available in the Offer schema.
      Returns:
      The OfferList containing all the offers.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • returnPriceRange

      java.util.List<Offer> returnPriceRange​(double min, double max) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method returns a list of Offer objects with a price per month between those 2 variables.
      Parameters:
      min - The minimum price per month for a offer.
      max - The maximum price per month for a offer.
      Returns:
      The Offer object with the price between those two variables.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • returnNumberOfRooms

      java.util.List<Offer> returnNumberOfRooms​(int noOfRooms) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method returns a list of offers from the database that have the same or more number of rooms.
      Parameters:
      noOfRooms - The number of rooms .
      Returns:
      The Offer object with the minimum an bigger number of rooms;
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • returnOfferType

      java.util.List<Offer> returnOfferType​(java.lang.String type) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method returns list of offers from the database with the same type.
      Parameters:
      type - The search title input.
      Returns:
      The a list of offers with the same title;
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • returnOfferFloor

      java.util.List<Offer> returnOfferFloor​(int floor) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method returns list of offers from the database that are located on the same floor.
      Parameters:
      floor - The floor number .
      Returns:
      A list of offers with the same floor number;
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • returnDeposit

      java.util.List<Offer> returnDeposit​(double deposit) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method returns a list of offers from the database that have the deposit indicated in the searchInt.
      Parameters:
      deposit - The deposit amount .
      Returns:
      A list of offers with the deposit maximum or less indicated in searchInt;
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database

    • returnCombinedFilter

      java.util.ArrayList<Offer> returnCombinedFilter​(double minPrice, double maxPrice, int noOfRooms, java.lang.String type, int floor, double deposit) throws java.sql.SQLException
      The method returns a list of offers from the database using a combined search filter and returns the objects that correspond to the arguments inserted.
      Parameters:
      minPrice - The minimum price per month for a offer.
      maxPrice - The maximum price per month for a offer.
      noOfRooms - The minimum number of rooms .
      type - The type of rent.
      floor - The floor number.
      deposit - The deposit amount.
      Returns:
      A list of offers sorted
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if there any problems with the database
